data.title: Britneyâ€™s 3 Marriages Include One That Lasted 55 Hoursâ€”A Guide To Her Exes
data.meta_description: Here's all of Britney Spears' husbands and marriages including Sam Asghari, Kevin Federline, and Jason Alexander
data.text:
Sam Asghari (2022 - 2023)

Britney Spears was linked to Sam Asghari after he appeared in her music video for â€œSlumber Party.â€ The two became engaged since September 2021 after five years of dating. Britney announced the engagement in an Instagram post on Sunday, September 12, 2021, after five years of dating. â€œI canâ€™t fucking believe it ğŸ’ğŸ’ğŸ’ğŸ’ğŸ’ğŸ’â£ï¸!!!!!!â€ she captioned a video of her showing her ring before kissing her fiancÃ©.

Britney Spears and Sam Asghari married on June 9, 2022, at their Los Angeles home, according to People. Sources told the magazine that the guest list included star-studded friends like Madonna, Paris Hilton, Drew Barrymore and Selena Gomez. Spearâ€™s father, mother, sister, and children did not attend the popstarâ€™s third wedding, as per TMZ. â€œBritney walked herself down the aisle. She looked absolutely stunning in her main dress,â€ an insider told People. â€œShe cried happy tears at some moments.â€

A year after their marriage, the two reportedly split. According to TMZ, thei Sam confronted Britney over rumors she stepped out on him.Sam has also reportedly moved out of their house and is now living in a place of his own. As one source put it, â€œItâ€™s only a matter of time before Sam files for divorce.â€

TMZ first reported that Britney and Sam were on the rocks in June 2023. The site reported that Britney got in a physical fight with Sam and screaming matches were frequent. The site also reported that it became so â€œvolatile,â€ security has had to step in.

TMZ also reported in June 2022 that Britney and Sam signed a prenup stating that Sam wouldnâ€™t receive any money Britney made before their wedding date if they divorced in the future.

Sam confirmed in an Instagram Story in September 2021 that he and Britney had plans to sign an â€œiron-clad prenupâ€ after their engagement that month. His post came after thousands of fans, including actress Octavia Spencer, told Britney to sign a prenup before she married Sam. â€œMake him sign a prenup,â€ Octavia commented at the time on Britneyâ€™s engagement post. In response to the comments, Sam took to his Instagram to joke about how he and Britney planned to sign a prenup to â€œprotect his jeep and shoe collection.â€ He wrote, â€œThank you everyone who is concerned about The Prenup! Of course weâ€™re getting [an] iron clad prenup to protect my jeep and shoe collection in case she dumps me one day.â€ He accompanied his post with two laughing emojis.

Hours after their split was reported, Sam Asghari filed for divorce from Britney Spears. According to TMZ, Sam is asking for spousal support and attorneys fees. The divorce documents reveal â€œ[Sam] has yet to determine the full nature and extent of the separate property assets and obligations of each party.â€ The doc continued, â€œThere are various items of community and quasi-community assets and debts, the full nature and extent of which are unknown to [Sam] at this time.â€

Kevin Federline (2004 - 2007)

Britney Spears and Kevin Federline were married from 2004 to 2007. The two met after they laid eyes on each other at the club. I met her at a club in Hollywood, Josephâ€™s. Our eyes met and that was it. We just hit it off right away,â€ the dancer recalled in 2008. â€œI was madly in love with her. Everything just seemed so right. I didnâ€™t see it as too fast or too slow.â€

They became engaged in July 2004 after three months of dating. In November 2006, Britney filed for divorce from Federline, citing irreconcilable differences and asking for both physical and legal custody of their two sons, with visitation rights for Federline. Their divorce was finalized in July 2007, however, in October 2007, a court ruled to grant Federline sole physical custody of their sons Jayden James and Sean Preston due to Britneyâ€™s â€œhabitual, frequent and continuous use of controlled substances and alcoholâ€ at the time, according to the judge.

Around this time, Spears was placed under a conservatorship led by her dad, Jamie Spears, and her lawyer, Andrew Wallet. As conservators over Spearsâ€™ person and estate, her father and her attorney had access to her doctors and medical records, could limit who visits her and had control over the financial decisions she makes. After her conservatorship was created, Spears and Federline were back to 50/50 custody over their kids. However, their agreement changed again in September 2019, when K-Fed was given 70 percent custody, while Spears was given 30 percent unsupervised custodial rights, according to Us Weekly. That change was confirmed to Us Weekly in March 2021 after a source told the magazine that Spears sees her sons â€œlessâ€ after Federline altered their custody agreement.

In 2022, it was reported that her sons were estranged. Jayden James told the Daily Mail that he and his brother had a falling out with Spears. Federline said her nude selfies on social media were â€œtoughâ€ for the boys to deal with publicly. â€œI try to explain to them, â€˜Look, maybe thatâ€™s just another way she tries to express herself.â€™ But that doesnâ€™t take away from the fact of what it does to them. Itâ€™s tough.â€ He added: â€œI canâ€™t imagine how it feels to be a teenager having to go to high school.â€

On not attending her wedding to Asghari, Jayden James said: â€œAt the time it just wasnâ€™t a good time to go. Iâ€™m not saying that Iâ€™m not happy for her,â€ Jayden said. â€œIâ€™m really happy for them, but she didnâ€™t invite the whole family, and then if it was just going to be me and Preston, I just donâ€™t see how that situation would have ended on good terms.â€ He continued that their relationship can â€œ100% â€¦ be fixed. Itâ€™s just going to take a lot of time and effort. I just want her to get better mentally. When she gets better I really want to see her again.â€

Hours after the interview was published, Spears replied in a statement on her Instagram, where she sent her son â€œall the love in the world to you every day for the rest of my life !!!!â€ She continued: â€œMy love for my children has no boundaries and it deeply saddens me to know his outcry of saying I wasnâ€™t up to his expectations of a mother â€¦ and maybe one day we can meet face to face and talk about this openly !!!!â€

Federline and his sons live in Hawaii after his current partner Victoria Prince, landed a job there. Federlineâ€™s attorney Mark Vincent Kaplan confirmed to Page Six that Spears had contact with her kids before they left for their new home.

Jason Alexander (2004)

Britney Spears was married briefly (and we mean VERY briefly) to Jason Alexander in 2004. He was a childhood sweetheart and the two were married for 55 hours. â€œIt was me being silly, being rebellious, and not really taking the responsibility of what I was doing, you know?â€ the â€œBabyâ€¦One More TImeâ€ singer later told E! News. â€œAnd after partying, you know, you really donâ€™t think about what youâ€™re doing. So it was one of those things that were really silly.â€

During Spearsâ€™ wedding with Sam Asghari, Alexander crashed the nuptials with a knife in his hand hours before she walked down the aisle.

Britneyâ€™s lawyer Matthew Rosengart told Page Six on June 10, 2022, â€œFortunately, Alexander is incarcerated and under an emergency protective order. I want to thank Sergeant Cyrus Zadeh, Detective Ken Michaelson and the Ventura County Sheriffâ€™s Office for their prompt and good work and look forward to working with law enforcement to ensure Alexander is aggressively prosecuted and hopefully convicted, as he should be.â€

Alexander â€œcontinuously trespassedâ€ on Britneyâ€™s Thousand Oaks, California home, according to the legal documents, and had been advised Thursday that he was â€œnot welcomed.â€ He appeared outside her home on June 9, 2022, with a knife in his hand and was live streaming the break-in on his Instagram, but he was apprehended before the ceremony. In a report obtained by Page Six, Spearsâ€™ ex-husband is ordered to stay away 100 feet from Spears and her husband, Sam Asghari. He also was arrested with $2,500 bail, as he also had an open warrant out for grand theft embezzlement and possession of stolen property, according to the Ventura County Sheriffâ€™s Office. Bail was set at an additional $20,000 for those charges. Her attorney added, â€œThis was an outrageous security breach, which I am livid about, but fortunately Britney is safe, and she was a stunning and happy bride.â€
